title: New jungle, what champs?
body:
I am looking for a new champion for the jungle, so far I have narrowed it down to 3 champions, Shaco, Udyr and Pantheon. Please answer these questions :)
1. Who has the best ganks?
2. Who is best at starting in the jungle?
3. Who is the funnest in your opinion?
4. Who has the best sustain?

replies.body: The crazy Diana clears are all you need!

Best ganks would be shaco and pantheon but if you cant gank on udyr you forgot your movespeed and ghost. 

Best starting would be sorta similar i thought although udyr definatly has advantage when it comes to killing a crowd. And shaco will kill his first camp really fast.

Shaco the most fun with stealth and box and ult. Pantheon is just kinda boring if you ask me, udyr can be fun to run around on really fast. Shaco / udyr alot more build paths than pantheon also. 

Best sustain.... depends how you build them / play them i would say. However shaco isn't as suited to building tanky items like the other two. All can get lifesteal but i probably wouldnt bother on udyr most matches cause he better of with something with movespeed / attack speed (no botrk isnt a "movespeed" item it wont get across the map faster) but i might consider it if im fighting a bruiser/tank with alot of lifesteal like warwick. Shacos pretty much a glass cannon but good use of boxes + damage will keep him going for a time however you would probably get crits/pene over sustain for him. Udyr can be full tank to bruiser, panth is a bruiser / glass and shaco is glass (well when built optimal anyway)

> shaco is only good in a 1v1 situation and not in team fights like, he dosent help the team as much as himself not a good jungle to take seriously but fun for a laugh. Udyr is jsut a hcamp that farms and dosent gank, he just come out of late game beast but the thing is  becasue of no ganks they enemy might be better than you and as we all know league players get mad easily.

Someone that clearly doesn't know how to play Shaco/Udyr. Just because they're harder to teamfight with, doesn't mean you can't teamfight with them. Just because Udyr scales well with farm, doesn't mean all Udyrs are going to mindlessly farm the Jungle.

OP: Play something you enjoy playing, that you know how to play.

You're forgetting about taking and controlling objectives. Pantheon can solo dragon at lvl 3. Nunu just obliterates objectives if you max q and know when to smite. If I build him very tanky and will rarely gank as my dmg is null. But what I make up for that is counter jungling and shutting down their jungler by never givig up a single dragon or baron.   Warwick is great too until his eventual rework so enjoy him while you can.

> You're forgetting about taking and controlling objectives. Pantheon can solo dragon at lvl 3. Nunu just obliterates objectives if you max q and know when to smite. If I build him very tanky and will rarely gank as my dmg is null. But what I make up for that is counter jungling and shutting down their jungler by never givig up a single dragon or baron.   Warwick is great too until his eventual rework so enjoy him while you can.

Rengar takes control of objectives with ease can also steal dragon in ult towers get destroyed by his empowered Q atk speed passive

> > You're forgetting about taking and controlling objectives. Pantheon can solo dragon at lvl 3. Nunu just obliterates objectives if you max q and know when to smite. If I build him very tanky and will rarely gank as my dmg is null. But what I make up for that is counter jungling and shutting down their jungler by never givig up a single dragon or baron.   Warwick is great too until his eventual rework so enjoy him while you can.
> 
> Rengar takes control of objectives with ease can also steal dragon in ult towers get destroyed by his empowered Q atk speed passive

if your going a lvl 6 ganker it might as well be warwick which is twice as strong

> > > You're forgetting about taking and controlling objectives. Pantheon can solo dragon at lvl 3. Nunu just obliterates objectives if you max q and know when to smite. If I build him very tanky and will rarely gank as my dmg is null. But what I make up for that is counter jungling and shutting down their jungler by never givig up a single dragon or baron.   Warwick is great too until his eventual rework so enjoy him while you can.
> > 
> > Rengar takes control of objectives with ease can also steal dragon in ult towers get destroyed by his empowered Q atk speed passive
> 
> if your going a lvl 6 ganker it might as well be warwick which is twice as strong

WW is getting a rework so I wouldn't get to comfortable with him at the moment. Goodluck seeing him played in ranked with his high ban rate. Also just watche SivHD do dragon with a lvl 1 pantheon.

Rengar is still pretty good in jg nice ganks hard engage can live for ages in teamfight with the right build and still do "TONS OF DAMAGE" 
but his early clears are a bit slow and ganks can be tricky pre-6 and his w sustain is insane

god tier: Lee, wwick, panth.
strong tier: vi, fiddle, amumu, udyr, jarvan,
pretty good tier: khazix, elise, sejuani, master yi,

My suggestion is don't bother with those 3 considering how dumpster they are compared to any of the meta junglers.

1. Who has the best ganks? Panth
2. Who is best at starting in the jungle? Shaco
3. Who is the funnest in your opinion? Pantheon since he's useful late game unlike some annoying clown that dies in 2 hits and the trick2g wannabe that flies around the map with 5k hp and 600 movement doing nothing.
4. Who has the best sustain? Udyr

unless you build tank shaco he is primarily a late game split pusher at best same with udyr
alot of the new jungle is still unventured territory with the starting side buffs smiting buffs or smaller camps for the buff it gives you, smite changes and jungle builds.
i have yet to see a better jungler/ganker/scaler than pantheon with his aoe, passive and crit passive makes short work of camps and with {{champion:19}} and {{champion:9}} enormous ban rate i really see no better option
